name: Advanced GMO Food Industry
desc:
Every organism, even an artificial one, has its limits. Yet with just a little bit of creativity and a few questionable modifications, it is possible to push life even further, beyond its usual boundaries. 

The majority of such rampant alterations were created (and, of course, copyrighted) by "Chapelle & Telgenhof Co." - one of the more profitable agricultural corporations of the Domain, and a subsidiary to a bigger enterprise. 

Interestingly enough, the modified organisms require a constant supply of surprisingly specific DNA-calibrating treatments to stay alive and productive. The treatments provided exclusively by the Conglomerate.
